page.title: 11F of D Berry Hill Schl Year
page.content: During March of this year we entered the{six a side football competition with schools in the Forest area.We came fourth.We had a two week break for Easter and a day for May Day.In June we had{the school fete where we could enter{a competition for the best dressed walker.We divided into three teams for{sports day in July.Most of us left for Lakers School at the end of the summer term.Holidays for six {weeks.In September we celebrated harv- {est by collecting lentils,split peas {,plain/wholemeal flour,dried milk and {sugar for School Aid to Ethiopia-been { a severe famine for 4 years.Two took{ the food to Gloucester for a train to Tilbury-then ship to Ethiopia.A sponsor day raised 700 pounsds.We performed 'The Day the Animals Sang' for our Christmas concert in December and had a party at the end of term.
